org.bukkit.attributes

Interface AttributeOwner

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Ageable, Ambient, Animals, ArmorStand, Bat, Blaze, CaveSpider, Chicken, ComplexLivingEntity, Cow, Creature, Creeper, EnderDragon, Enderman, Endermite, Flying, Ghast, Giant, Golem, Guardian, Horse, HumanEntity, IronGolem, LivingEntity, MagmaCube, Monster, MushroomCow, NPC, Ocelot, Pig, PigZombie, Player, Rabbit, Sheep, Silverfish, Skeleton, Slime, Snowman, Spider, Squid, Villager, WaterMob, Witch, Wither, Wolf, Zombie

    public interface AttributeOwner
    Something that has values for Attributes and is affected by them.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<Attribute> getAttributes()
      Get all Attributes applicable to this owner
      AttributeValue getAttributeValue(Attribute attribute)
      Get the value object of the given Attribute, or null if the attribute is not applicable to this owner.
      AttributeValue getAttributeValue(String name)
      Get the value object of the Attribute with the given name, or null if the owner has no applicable attribute by that name.
      boolean hasAttribute(Attribute attribute)
      Is the given Attribute applicable to this owner?
      void removeAttributeModifier(AttributeModifier modifier)
      Remove the given AttributeModifier from all of this owner's AttributeValues.
      void removeAttributeModifier(UUID id)
      Remove the AttributeModifier with the given UUID from all of this owner's AttributeValues.

    • Method Detail

      • removeAttributeModifier
